name: Craft Bike Jersey - Youths
description: Give the peloton powerhouses of tomorrow every advantage with this sleek and wicking jersey. Part of Craft’s Core line, the youth’s Bike jersey is at home on weekend tours, club rides, or their first Gran Fondo.Body mapped construction puts the most breathable materials where you need them most.Made using a solution dying process that uses 75% less water and 39% less energy than standard dying.Light polyester materials wick away moisture.¼ zip offers easy venting.3 back drop-in pockets fit a light windbreaker, some tools and a handful of gels.Dropped hem provides extra coverage in the drop.Silicone grips at the back hem keeps the jersey in place.
